title: Health bars are now black?
body: I got into game yesterday after downloading the new patch and all of the health bars are now black. This makes it really hard for me to be able to see who is low or not as a result. Is this a glitch or intended because I might as well not have health bars anymore with the way they look to me now.

replies.body: Looks like a missing texture to me, what you do see is the overlay that goes over the base colour afaik, so you're basically missing the base texture for the health bar. A repair should fix it.

In case it's helpful, what I've noticed in game is that to fix this issue, I need to click the vertical sync button.

Oh? Sounds like it could be a driver issue if that's the case, and if you mean turning vsync on fixes it, if you have a decent PC there's really no reason not to have vsync off anyway. Ofc if you see performance loss that is a reason.

As for your overall issue. Try updating your graphics drivers. If changing vsync settings is fixing it/breaking it, I'd say that's most likely the problem.

Failing that you can force a repatch: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4
If this started just when the new patch rolled out this could well be your problem, but it's still more likely that it's an outdated graphics driver not liking the new patch.

If that also fails then a clean reinstall is the way to go. Best to do this via the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
You'll have to redo all your client side settings (some are server side and will be unaffected) after doing this.

Assuming your graphics drivers are up to date it's the best I've got.
